question.body: What is the effect of cardiac output (CO) on mean arterial pressure (MAP) in a resting individual?

response.feedback: Correct. As cardiac output (CO) increases, so does mean arterial pressure (MAP).
Incorrect. As cardiac output (CO) increases, mean arterial pressure (MAP) does not decrease. Cardiac output (CO) is directly proportional to mean arterial pressure (MAP).
